title: GameSparks Game Details
description: The API to manage the GameSparks game details

getAnalyticsDataUsingGET.title: Returns the results of executed query defined by the parameters passed in

getDataCountUsingGET.title: Returns the count of executed query

getRetentionUsingGET.title: Returns the percentage of user retention over the last 30 days

updateCredentialSecretUsingPOST.title: Resets the secret of a credential
